title: Endangered species take permits (ESA Section 10)
dataVerified: Permit holder, species, take authorization, mitigation, USFWS/NOAA
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (active/expired). Link to USFWS/NOAA Fisheries system (enforcement and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake ESA permits. Domain binding verifies USFWS/NOAA Fisheries. Endangered Species Act compliance. Criminal prosecution for unauthorized take. Habitat conservation plan verification.
